2.3.name: wordpress/breukies-links-widget
2.3.description: Breukie’s Links Widget is a wordPress links widget, to replace the standard links widget by Automattic. This widget displays links using the wp_list_bookmarks function, utilizes most available parameters. You can also set up to 9 intances of this widget in your sidebar(s).
